title: How to Add Someone to a FaceTime Call on iPhone or iPad

steps.title: While you're on a call, tap anywhere on the screen.
steps.content: While you're on a call, tap anywhere on the screen. This brings up several FaceTime options.

steps.title: You'll see this option after tapping the screen on a call.
steps.content: You'll see this option after tapping the screen on a call. Now you'll be able to add contacts to the call. [1] X Research source

steps.title: A list of matching contacts will appear.
steps.content: A list of matching contacts will appear. Alternatively, you can enter a phone number, or tap + to open your Contacts.

steps.title: This adds the selected person to the invitation list.
steps.content: This adds the selected person to the invitation list. You can now add additional people if you'd like.

steps.title: This calls the person or people you've selected.
steps.content: This calls the person or people you've selected. If the selected contact(s) accepts this request, they'll be added to the FaceTime call.
